results.title: Pseudopheochromocytoma: An uncommon cause of malignant hypertension
results.text_hl: Two months later, we reduced @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ to 50 mg/day to prevent @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ episodes and he had a stable blood pressure within normal ranges even after exercise.
